item.title: South African municipal elections 2016
item.description: Style for changing title colour depending on photo div.post-heading span.meta { color: black; } Introduction With South Africa’s municipal elections in a few days time (3rd August 2016), I wondered about the effort being expended by the parties in each district or municipality. Has it increased or decreased since the 2011 elections? I must point out that I am not a political analyst or a political scientist. I am nevertheless a scientist with an appreciation for analytics.
